channel.title: Org on Chuck
channel.description: Recent content in Org on Chuck

item.title: My Custom Org Agenda
item.author: chuckxcp@qq.com (Chuck)
item.description: By setting the org-agenda-custom-commands variable, we can define our own agenda views that only include necessary information.

item.title: Better capture template for blog post
item.author: chuckxcp@qq.com (Chuck)
item.description: An org capture template to create post file in blog directory, and insert some front matters.

item.title: Emacs中记笔记
item.author: chuckxcp@qq.com (Chuck)
item.description: Denote is a simple note-taking tool for Emacs.

item.title: Org导出HTML时生成稳定ID
item.author: chuckxcp@qq.com (Chuck)
item.description: 使用Org导出成HTML的时候，文档内部的标题和图片等元素都会生成格式如 orgxxxxxxx 的ID，这个ID从字面上并不能看出来对应那个元素，并且每次文档重新导出时，这个ID都会改变。

item.title: Publishing Org-mode files to HTML
item.author: chuckxcp@qq.com (Chuck)
item.description: This is a guide to describe how to publish Org mode files to HTML.
